Text.Page:
We've hurt the orcans, but they're not backing off. They're not this brave normally.

Perhaps the unseelie trinkets allow the fey to compel their allies.

Find their leader, Tarlok, and put him down. Maybe the shock of his death will send the message we need.

This strange...whatever it is...simply reeks of the unseelie. They, like all faeries, have subtle, but powerful magic.

Tarlok's death might just be enough to dissuade the orcans in the future.

Well done!
Follow the river to the southwest. Tarlok rarely leaves his camp.
